subject: HBO Pilot
event:
Hiya, kids, hiya, hiya, hiya.

I know some cool stuff.

You don't.

And I can't tell you yet.

(Yes, I am a monster of inhuman cruelty).

Well, maybe I'll let slip a few things at the Montreal worldcon.  Or maybe not.  You'll have to ply me with booze and plunk my magic twanger, and we'll see.

Off on Tuesday...

comments.article:
...

lol

You'll have to ply me with booze and plunk my magic twanger

Does Parris know about this?

comments.upictitle: i do it for the lulz: IKR
comments.article: win
best. post. ever.
comments.subject: lol

comments.article:
Better than Sean Bean?

It must be great news! Tell us, Uncle Andy!

comments.upictitle: An Internet person, on the Internet: I am the sun
comments.article: Aghhhhhh!! *fistshakes*
So cruel!

comments.upictitle: David Alexander McDonald (Steven E. McDonald): Typewriter Obama Stylee
comments.article:
Listen, old son, I'm not touching your Magic Twanger even with my hands quad-bagged! I know where that thing's been, mate, and I'm not up for turning funny colors and coming over all Spike Milligan.

Good to know you're excited, though. Bloody hard work being this successful, innit, though?
Damn it Winter is actually coming!? I thought you were lying!
Sounds like you've already had some booze :P

comments.upictitle: Kelley: l » that would be dark
comments.article: We'll sit here, and wait <s>im</s>patiently.

...seriously? Tease.

But honestly, I don't know what news about the pilot would be so very exciting right now. There are still a lot of roles to be filled, sure, but I'm already a big fan of the casting... so right now, the news I'm really waiting for are a season order and a start date, both of which I'm pretty sure we won't be seeing for at least another 9 months or so.
Oh, now, that's just mean, George. :D
nice :)
And after Montreal, come to Toronto and we'll have a personal chat, yeah?

nuhhhhhhhhh ;_; but i wanna know now

*whines*
George you are such a tease! ;___;

comments.upictitle: Tarius - The Crazy Roman: Scorpion from my SC Scroll
comments.article: Excellent, I hope to hear about it while I'm there, it is just a few minutes from my place after all, that is presuming I get the time off.
comments.subject: Montreal...

comments.article: someone decided to cast Keanu Reeves as Tyrion?
That would have been awesome. Unfortunately, they've cast some dude named Peter Dinklage. Who the heck is he?

You're great, man, but if I need this, I'll get Ty drunk.

And "magic twanger?" There's a hell of a euphemism . . .

Wow. Mr. Martin, you are very much living my dream.

I would die a happy man if I could go to a con extort booze out of my fanbase in exchange for tidbits about my next project. But I guess I have to actually have a fanbase first... and a project.

A man can dream, though.
ahahahahahahahaha :D

I'm sure that you know a lot of cool stuff that we don't.

But we (well most of us) have been trained to be patient.

We just have to maintain our discipline and wait for whenever the proper time comes. :)
Auuughhh!  So cruel.  I can't ply anyone with booze, I end up joining in and telling them about my embarrassing moments back in middle school.
You are a cruel, cruel master, George.
Meanie!
